subtitleNullable: Train images in gray scale color scheme and resized to 256 by 256 pixels
descriptionNullable:
### Context

The 2022 Happywhale competition has provided lots of train and test images to work on image classification models for whales and dolphins. The original dataset has a size greater than 60GB which may be difficult to work with in a local machine with limited hard drive storage space.
This dataset is a resized version where all the original dataset images were resized to 256 by 256 pixels and had applied a gray scale color map.

For those who are beginners in image classification (like myself), it can provide you the following bennefits:
* Possibility to download the dataset and work in your local machine.
* Reduced computational time during your model experimentation.
title: Happywhale 2022 competition - Images 256 by 256
